title: Six killed in landslide, flooding at Rohingya camps in Bangladesh
content:
1. Six killed in landslide, flooding at Rohingya camps in Bangladesh  Reuters
  2. Bangladesh landslides kill at least 6 Rohingya refugees, force thousands out of camp shelters  South China Morning Post
  3. Bangladesh evacuates 10,000 Rohingya from landslide-hit camps  FRANCE 24
  4. Deadly landslides, flooding hit Rohingya camps in Bangladesh  Al Jazeera English
  5. Heavy Rain Causes Deadly Landslide at Bangladesh Rohingya Camp  Radio Free Asia
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
